objects.name: ReserveDirections
objects.string: Reserve (left click to add to the deck):

objects.name: DeckDirections
objects.string: Deck (right click to remove from the deck):

events.comment: Create one card of each and add it to the reserve.
Move a card from the reserve to the deck
Move a card back to the reserve
Manual shuffling of the deck
Pick 1 card from the top of the deck and put it in the hand
Transition to the RollingDiscard state to roll the discard back to the deck if necessary
Pick 3 cards from the top of the deck and put it in the hand
The cards can be picked in 2 steps: before and after the discard rolling.
Transition to the RollingDiscard state to roll the discard back to the deck if necessary
Manual roll of the discard back to the deck
Discard a card from the hand
Roll the discard if there is not enough card in the deck to pick.
The rolling is finished or didn't happen, pick the cards and give back the control to the user.

Clear cards selection as every card will be put in the right location.
The TopCardZOrder allow to put card that change of stack in front,
because they might overlap other cards on their trajectory.

The card is in the right row. It will only update X.
This can happen when a card is removed or added from the row and the other ones must shift.

The card is in the wrong row. It will move to the right row.
It excludes cards that currently moving to this row
as they don't have the right Y position yet,
but the tween must not be reset.

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: ToggleSwitch
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Toggle switch that users can click or touch.
description: Add this behavior to a shape painter object.
When the toggle switch is in the *left* position, the condition `Checked` is "false". If it is in the *right* position, the condition `Checked` is true.
A halo appears when the mouse hovers near the toggle switch.
Toggle switch cannot be toggled by users if any of these are true:
Toggle switch can always be changed by an action.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Use a shape-painter object to draw a toggle switch that users can click or touch.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: ToggleSwitch

events.comment: Fix bad inputs that create malformed toggle switches
Animate the thumb to the right place
Detect hover/touch/click (but only if the layer and object is visible, and the object is not already being dragged)
Detect mouse clicks near track, start dragging
Reset scene variable
Set inactive track parameters (by default, use thumb color)
Draw half circle at end (optional)
Draw inactive track
Set active track parameters (by default, use thumb color)
Draw half circle at end (optional)
Draw active track
Draw halo when the mouse is hovering over thumb
Use darker halo while being pressed
Drop Shadow
Prepare thumb settings
Draw Circle thumb
Make sure object doesn't get re-drawn every frame

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: D8H
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: ObjectStack
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: An ordered list of objects and a shuffle action.
description: * Actions to modify a stack of objects
* Conditions to access the objects of a stack
* Fair randomness (for instance, to create a stack of predetermined bonus and randomize the order they appear)
* a card system demonstration ([open the project online](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?project=example://card-system))
